original_text: Then he brought forward the tribe of Benjamin, clan by clan, and Matri’s clan was taken. Finally Saul son of Kish was taken. But when they looked for him, he was not to be found.
korean_text: 베냐민 지파를 그들의 가족별로 가까이 오게 하였더니 마드리의 가족이 뽑혔고 그 중에서 기스의 아들 사울이 뽑혔으나 그를 찾아도 찾지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: Then he brought forward the tribe of Benjamin
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 베냐민 지파를 앞으로 나오게 했다

sentences.original_text: Finally Saul son of Kish was taken
But when they looked for him
he was not to be found
